name: Goblin Musketeer

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

actions.name: Two goblin musketeers together can operate a musket
actions.desc: If one uses its action to assist  the other gains the following additional action:

actions.name: Musket
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit  range 60/180 ft.  one target. Hit: 10 (2d8 + 1) piercing damage.

document__title: Level Up Advanced 5e Monstrous Menagerie OGL
